panels.description: Last 30s hashrate based on selected filter.
panels.title: Hashrate

panels.description: Last 30s submission rate based on selected filters.
panels.title: Submission Rate

panels.description: Split of hashrate in case multiple goals are defined.
panels.title: Hashrate Split

panels.description: Overview of who closed the connection in case it was closed (internal = Farm Proxy, external = miner).
panels.title: Downstream connections close side

panels.description: Number of connections greater than 0 to upstream.
panels.title: Connection to upstream

panels.description: How many miners subscribed to which target.
panels.title: Subscription by target

panels.description: Score is calculated from latency, rejection rate and error rate. If current target's score is too high, Farm proxy switches to target with lower score.
panels.title: Score by target

panels.description: Error rate is rate of errors in communication to upstream (i.e. timeouts).
panels.title: Error rate

panels.description: Target can be marked as "down" from various reasons. Tarket in "down" status is not available for receiving hashrate.
panels.title: Reason for Target Down
